com.softbank.recipesitory.service

クラス RecipeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.softbank.recipesitory.service.RecipeService

  • @Service
public class RecipeService
extends java.lang.Object
    JDBC ドライバが裏で働いてるレシピサービス。 ドライバはRecipeRepoで管理する.
    作成者:
    pikachoo
    関連項目:
    RecipeRepo}

      • addRecipe

        public Recipe addRecipe(@Valid
                        @Valid Recipe recipe)
        Add the given Recipe into the store.
        パラメータ:
        Recipe - to be added
        戻り値:
        the Recipe that was added; this should be updated with the actual id in the store.
        例外:
        InvalidRecipeException

      • editRecipe

        public Recipe editRecipe(int id,
                         Recipe recipe)
                  throws RecipeNotFoundException
        Edit the current existing Recipe in the store.
        パラメータ:
        id - of the Recipe to be updated
        Recipe - the new details of the Recipe
        戻り値:
        the currently inserted record of id
        例外:
        InvalidRecipeException
        RecipeNotFoundException
